channel.title: How to set admin/mod in Ultimate Pk Source
channel.description:
I wanna now how i set admins and mods in the source ULTIMATE PK (by doobie) Can someone help me with this?
--Thank You

item.title: How to set admin/mod in Ultimate Pk Source
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Open up the character file and open the character you want to give rights to. Change the 0 to the number you want.
Eg 0=normal player
1=player mod
2=admin
3=owner

Read full topic
item.source: How to set admin/mod in Ultimate Pk Source
